originalText.text: GDS Group is growing at a fast pace! And because of that, the onboarding experience has been successfully revamped. Expectations of you are very apparent and it is made clear that you are an asset to the company’s success. The company is extremely organized and a very fun atmosphere. I am thrilled and honored to be a part of the GDS Group family.

text.text: GDS Group is growing at a fast pace! And because of that, the onboarding experience has been successfully revamped. Expectations of you are very apparent and it is made clear that you are an asset to the company’s success. The company is extremely organized and a very fun atmosphere. I am thrilled and honored to be a part of the GDS Group family.

originalText.text: GDS has a great culture.  They make all of their employees feel like a family.  The training is top notch, and they are very invested in making everybody the best they can be.  The top performers will take time out of their busy schedules to help you if you need it.  Overall GDS has great opportunities for you no matter what stage of your career you are in!

text.text: GDS has a great culture.  They make all of their employees feel like a family.  The training is top notch, and they are very invested in making everybody the best they can be.  The top performers will take time out of their busy schedules to help you if you need it.  Overall GDS has great opportunities for you no matter what stage of your career you are in!

originalText.text:
As someone who has worked in sales, GDS is all about their employees and their success.
CEO is very hands on and approachable whenever need be.
Company invests heavily on sales operations and sales training to make sure that you can grow in your career.
We have quarterly company outings and celebrations which is a major plus!
Apart from amazing culture, we also get free snacks!

originalText.text: GDS group has a fantastic culture. One of the best companies I've ever worked for and strive to continue and build a career here. The people here are some of the most talented and fun people to be around. The opportunity to make money and new connections are infinite.

text.text: GDS group has a fantastic culture. One of the best companies I've ever worked for and strive to continue and build a career here. The people here are some of the most talented and fun people to be around. The opportunity to make money and new connections are infinite.

originalText.text: I have thoroughly enjoyed my close to 4 year career at GDS after moving to New York from Sydney. The company has supported me in my sales career and is a great place to work if you are willing to work hard. We sell amazing products and I work with many of the top enterprise companies across North America! I would recommend GDS to any of my friends.
